data.text: @Joesephyr A little late message, but glad to see you're over Covid now, Joe. It's a shame you even had to deal with it in the first place. And congrats on getting the KH2 plat. It's one I wanted to do myself, but the speedrun one and grinding part to get to Org 13 puts me off. 😒
@Joesephyr Haven't played a Tactics style game since Tactics Ogre!  Super hyped to play this :D
